reviewText: I really enjoy the Fairy Tail series, and I hope that Funimation keeps producing more episodes.  My review would have been 5 stars, but I'm not a fan of having to purchase both regular and Blu-Ray DVD's at 1 time.Hiro Mashima, the series author, has created a vast, exciting world.  The background of the main characters is rich, and quite often, filled with tragic events.People who enjoy this series may want to consider following Fairy Tail in the Manga format.  Fans may also want to read Hiro Mashima's prior work, Rave Master, as it follows similar themes.
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: Season one comes to an end on my favorite series. Buy this if you're an anime fan. It's absolutely amazing. I hope they release season two soon!
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: It's a great anime what else can I say. A great shounen that redefined the classic magic genre. Great action, comedy, good plot for Jella arc sorta and the Lacy's one is complete in the DVD. If you already have some fairy tail DVD and love it you won't be dissatisfied by this. If you love naruto shippuden, bleach, Dragon ball , D.gray man or fma brotherhood you probably love this show.
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: This is a wonderful serie who gets more interested in this part.I recommend this serie for everyone :DI can't wait to part 5 comes out :D
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: In part 4 Erza's ordeal with her past finally comes to an end, just before the world was wrecked by the Etherion Beam. Upon their return Natsu's team is confronted by Laxus and his lackeys. Laxus is trying to overthrow his grandfather and take over the guild. He sets up a tournament to prove he's the strongest and qualified to be the leader.I actually liked the first 3 volumes better than this one, but if you like Fairy Tail then go ahead and check out volume 4. My opinion is just my opinion, and you may like volume 4 the best. Either way, I hope you enjoy it.
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: part 4 of fairy tail is a awesome dvd its blu-ray so its a little more money but soooooo worth it!! the dvd came really fast and look great A++++++
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: I love reading this series and watching it!  The wording, how the drawing of the characters are done---love it all :)Great work and effort to the creator of this series!
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: While the set gives us the finale of the Jellal/Erza arc it also gives us the entire story episodes of the Laxus/Fairy Tail story arc as well, which is truly appreciated.  While it's going to be a little annoying having to wait until we can get the rest of the series here in the States I'm still appreciative to Funimation for giving us the series sets we have right now as well.  The voice cast for the characters both for the dubbed and subbed are fantastic in their roles and fit them perfectly and hopefully for us the dubbed cast will come back again to redo their roles for this series when Funimation can get more episodes from the Japanese producers.  Though that might take a little while seeing as the series itself is just entering into its 120th episode so we may have to wait a year at least.  Like with past sets you'll have two regular dvd discs and two blu-ray dvd disc to choose whichever one you want to watch, while I usually watch most of my anime on my computer I have checked a few of the blu-ray dvd's out as well and both standard and blu-ray formats look great.  So for fans of magical/action animes or for fans looking for a amazing series in general here's a very good one to try out and for the price a great deal too....
summary: Nice Conclusion to Two Of The Series Story Arcs But Really The End Just Yet
Title: Fairy Tail: Part 4

reviewText: I have liked all of fairy tale and I hope they continue creating more amazing english dubbed collections, they are really eye catching and keep me interested can't wait for more.
